topic_data.name: GM/GN Culture
topic_data.explanation: The 'GM/GN' (Good Morning/Good Night) greetings continue to be a prevalent cultural phenomenon on Farcaster. Users consistently use these greetings to start and end their days, showing a persistent community ritual.

evaluation.reasoning: Fifth GM topic, adding GN (Good Night). Still baseline ritual. Low novelty/specificity.
